name: @kzmshx/auto-ticket-issuer
description: Sample project creating a Backlog ticket when a GitHub Pull Request is opened.

scripts.redeploy: clasp deploy -d current -i $( clasp deployments | awk '{ if ($5 == "current") { print $2 } }' | head -n 1)
scripts.fix: npm run prettier -- -w && npm run eslint -- --fix && npm run sort
scripts.lint: npm run prettier -- -c && npm run eslint && npm run sort -- --check
